Hello, I am Hasanur

After a long period of poor health, I begun to reevaluate what I wanted in life. That reflection led to the reigniting of my passion for Computer Science.

Right now I am focused on exploring the foundations of Computing from the silicon up. I am focused on GPU architecuture and computing, as well computer architecture more broadly, peeling away abstraction layers to understand how systems work at a foundational level.

GOAL: To work at the forefront of computing technology, driving innovation in GPUs and next generation architectures.

Curious to see what I am working on in more detail?
Check out my notes or see what I am actively working on here.

“Real understanding begins where the abstractions end.”
